HomePage.title: Connecting Neighbors, Strengthening Communities
HomePage.sub-banner-text: We're here to help. Whether you need assistance or want to contribute, we're building a stronger community together.
HomePage.help-sub-text: Our services range from providing essential support to fostering community engagement. We're committed to making a difference in the lives of our neighbors.
HomePage.our-services-text: We offer a variety of services to support our community.
HomePage.assistance-text: Access to resources and support for those in need.
HomePage.community-text: Programs and events to foster community connections.
HomePage.volunteer-text: Opportunities to give back and make a difference in your community.
HomePage.contact-text: Have questions or need assistance? Reach out to us.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.subtitle: Connecting neighbors. Empowering communities. Delivering hope.
AboutPage.missionText: We believe that no one should face hardship alone. Our platform bridges the gap between those who need support and those who are ready to help ‚Äî through food, clothing, medical aid, or a simple act of kindness.

values.empathyText: Every request represents a real human need. We approach each one with care and compassion.
values.communityText: We strengthen communities by empowering individuals to support each other.
values.transparencyText: Every request and every delivery is tracked openly to ensure trust and accountability.
values.localImpactText: We focus on making a difference right where it matters most ‚Äî in your neighborhood.

AboutPage.storyText: What started as a small initiative during times of crisis has grown into a platform connecting hundreds of volunteers and families across multiple zones. Together, we‚Äôve turned compassion into action ‚Äî one request at a time.
AboutPage.joinText: Whether you want to volunteer, contribute, or request assistance ‚Äî your involvement strengthens our community.

header.title: Our Services
header.subtitle: At Community Connect (FMH), we make it easier for communities, volunteers, and admins to come together ‚Äî ensuring help reaches those who need it most, right on time.

request.title: Request Assistance
request.description: Need food, hygiene kits, or clothing? Use our simple public form to request help quickly and easily ‚Äî even offline.

admin.title: Admin Quick Entry
admin.description: Admins can log field requests instantly, tagging them by need type and priority to ensure no request is missed.

delivery.title: Delivery Tracking
delivery.description: From request to delivery ‚Äî track every stage transparently. Volunteers can update statuses in real time.

volunteer.title: Volunteer Coordination
volunteer.description: Volunteers stay updated with active requests and statuses, enabling smooth coordination and faster help.

donor.title: Donor Support
donor.description: Donors can contribute directly or pledge recurring support ‚Äî every contribution is tracked for transparency.

dashboard.title: Requests Dashboard
dashboard.description: Easily filter, manage, and export requests ‚Äî built for simplicity today and scalability tomorrow.

cta.title: Be Part of the Movement üåç
cta.description: Whether you want to volunteer, donate, or raise awareness ‚Äî every action strengthens communities.
